scripts.start: concurrently "cd IoT-Auditor-backend && npm start" "cd IoT-Auditor-frontend && npm run dev" "cd IoT-Auditor-hardware && uvicorn main:app --workers 9 --reload"
scripts.start local: concurrently "cd IoT-Auditor-backend && npm start" "cd IoT-Auditor-frontend && npm run dev" "cd IoT-Auditor-hardware && uvicorn main:app --reload"
